meaningMnemonic: You want to <kanji>mix</kanji> opinions from <kanji>outside</kanji> your country into the way you handle things. That's called <vocabulary>diplomacy</vocabulary>. If you mix your country with the ones outside of your own, you'll all profit!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
